mapper.sql: id, tea_garden_id, dic_standard, rec_quantity, pick_number, pick_batch_no, pick_area, pick_time, operator_id, description, create_id, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into e_harvest_records
id,
tea_garden_id,
dic_standard,
rec_quantity,
pick_number,
pick_batch_no,
pick_area,
pick_time,
operator_id,
description,
create_id,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update e_harvest_records
tea_garden_id = #{teaGardenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dic_standard = #{dicStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rec_quantity = #{recQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pick_number = #{pickNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pick_batch_no = #{pickBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pick_area = #{pickArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pick_time = #{pickTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update e_harvest_records set tea_garden_id = #{teaGardenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_standard = #{dicStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rec_quantity = #{recQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pick_number = #{pickNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pick_batch_no = #{pickBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pick_area = #{pickArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pick_time = #{pickTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT hr.*, mb.batch_number, u.chinese_name FROM e_harvest_records hr, e_manage_batch mb, s_users u WHERE hr.id = #{id} AND hr.pick_number = mb.id AND hr.create_id = u.id
